summary: An intimate portrait of controversial cartoonist Robert Crumb and his traumatized family.
cast: Robert Crumb|Aline Kominsky-Crumb|Charles Crumb|Maxon Crumb|Robert Hughes|Martin Muller|Don Donahue|Dana Morgan|Trina Robbins|Spain Rodriguez|Bill Griffith|Deirdre English|Peggy Orenstein|Beatrice Crumb|Kathy Goodell|Dian Hanson|Sophie Crumb|Jesse Crumb|Joseph Frantz
title: Crumb
